mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT /* rehandlingOfRORO.selectBlComboBoxItems */ BL_NO AS CD, BL_NO AS CD_NM FROM TMT_BL WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND STAT_CD = 'AP' AND CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV')

SELECT DISTINCT /* rehandlingOfRORO.selectShipgNoteNoComboBoxItems */ SHIPG_NOTE_NO AS CD, SHIPG_NOTE_NO AS CD_NM, PKG_QTY, CATG_CD, dbo.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CATGTP', CATG_CD) AS CATG_NM, MF_DOC_ID FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND STAT_CD = 'AP' AND CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV')
AND CATG_CD IN ('T') AND CATG_CD IN ('R')
AND CATG_CD IN ('E')

SELECT /* rehandlingOfRORO.selectRehandlingCargoItems */ S.CATG_CD, dbo.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CATGTP', S.CATG_CD) AS CATG_NM, ISNULL(R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID, '') AS NX_VSL_CALL_ID, R.NX_REF_NO, CASE WHEN R.RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN S.MF_DOC_ID ELSE '' END AS BOOKING_NO, S.CG_TP_CD, dbo.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CGTP', S.CG_TP_CD) AS CG_TP_NM, R.RHDL_NO, R.RHDL_MODE, dbo.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'RHDLMODE', R.RHDL_MODE) AS RHDL_MODE_NM, R.PKG_QTY, R.CG_WGT, R.CG_VOL, FORMAT(R.UPDATE_TIME, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') AS UPDATE_TIME, R.STAFF_CD FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R INNER JOIN TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S ON ( ( R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = S.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.RHDL_MODE = 'C' AND R.NX_REF_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO ) OR ( R.VSL_CALL_ID = S.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.RHDL_MODE = 'R' AND R.ORG_REF_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO ) ) WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.ORG_REF_NO = #{cargoNo}

SELECT /* rehandlingOfRORO.selectRehandlingCargoItemsCount */ COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT S.CATG_CD, dbo.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CATGTP', S.CATG_CD) AS CATG_NM, ISNULL(R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID, '') AS NX_VSL_CALL_ID, R.NX_REF_NO, CASE WHEN R.RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN S.MF_DOC_ID ELSE '' END AS BOOKING_NO, S.CG_TP_CD, dbo.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CGTP', S.CG_TP_CD) AS CG_TP_NM, R.RHDL_NO, R.RHDL_MODE, dbo.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'RHDLMODE', R.RHDL_MODE) AS RHDL_MODE_NM, R.PKG_QTY, R.CG_WGT, R.CG_VOL, FORMAT(R.UPDATE_TIME, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') AS UPDATE_TIME, R.STAFF_CD FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R INNER JOIN TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S ON ((R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = S.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.RHDL_MODE = 'C' AND R.NX_REF_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) OR (R.VSL_CALL_ID = S.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.RHDL_MODE = 'R' AND R.ORG_REF_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) ) WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.ORG_REF_NO = #{cargoNo} ) AS TEMPTB
SELECT /* rehandlingOfRORO.selectRhdlGroupNo */ ISNULL(MAX(CAST(S.RHDL_GROUP_NO AS INT)), 0) + 1 FROM TMT_RHDL_CG S WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND S.ORG_REF_NO = #{cargoNo}

SELECT /* rehandlingOfRORO.selectRhdlNo */ 'R' + FORMAT(SYSDATETIME(), 'yyMMdd') + ISNULL( RTRIM( LTRIM( FORMAT( MAX(CONVERT( INT, RIGHT(RHDL_NO, 4))) + 1 , '0000') ) ) , '0001') FROM TMT_RHDL_CG WHERE SUBSTRING(RHDL_NO, 1, 7) = CONCAT('R', FORMAT(SYSDATETIME(), 'yyMMdd'))

SELECT /* rehandlingOfRORO.selectDeletingValidationYn */ CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{nextVslCallId} AND CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND RHDL_NO = #{rhdlNo} AND ( OUT_DTM IS NOT NULL AND OUT_DTM <> '')
mapper.insert: INSERT /* rehandlingOfRORO.insertRehandlingItem */ INTO TMT_RHDL_CG ( RHDL_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, ORG_REF_NO, NX_VSL_CALL_ID, NX_REF_NO, OPE_CLASS_CD, PKG_QTY, CG_WGT, CG_VOL, STS_YN, ORG_GR_NO, RHDL_MODE, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION, JOB_NO, CG_CO_CD, SP_CA_CO_CD, CG_NO, NX_CG_NO, RHDL_GROUP_NO ) VALUES ( #{rhdlNo}, #{vslCallId}, #{cargoNo}, #{nextVslCallId}, #{shipgNoteNo}, #{catgCd}, #{rhdlQty}, #{rhdlMt}, #{rhdlM3}, NULL, NULL, #{rhdlModeCd}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{version}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{rhdlGroupNo} )

INSERT /* rehandlingOfRORO.insertRehandlingUnitItem */ INTO TMT_RORO_MST ( RORO_SEQ, CHASSIS_NO, BRAND_CD, MODEL_CD, LOC_ID, WH_ID, IN_DTM, CG_WGT, CBM, RHDL_MODE, RHDL_NO, STAT_CD, DELV_TP_CD, IX_CD, CATG_CD, CG_TP_CD, VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, STAFF_CD, UPDATE_TIME, DRIVER_LICENSE, DRIVER_NM, GATE_IN_DTM, DRIVER_ID, TRUCK_NO, GATE_TICKET_NO, PLAN_WH_ID, PLAN_LOC_ID, PLAN_BY, PLAN_DTM, DOC_WGT, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DTM, VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, GR_NO ) SELECT CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN RORO_SEQ ELSE (SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(FORMAT(MAX(A.ROROSEQ), '0000'))) AS ROROSEQ FROM (SELECT CAST(MAX(RORO_SEQ) AS INT) + 1 AS ROROSEQ FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND MF_DOC_ID = #{docNo} AND CG_NO = #{cargoNo} UNION SELECT 1 ROROSEQ ) A ) END, CHASSIS_NO, BRAND_CD, MODEL_CD, LOC_ID, WH_ID, IN_DTM, CG_WGT, CBM, RHDL_MODE, RHDL_NO, 'ST' AS STAT_CD, 'I' AS DELV_TP_CD, 'X' AS IX_CD, #{catgCd} AS CATG_CD, CG_TP_CD, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN #{nextVslCallId} ELSE #{vslCallId} END AS VSL_CALL_ID, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN #{bookingNo} ELSE MF_DOC_ID END AS MF_DOC_ID, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN #{shipgNoteNo} ELSE CG_NO END AS CG_NO, #{userId} AS STAFF_CD, SYSDATETIME() AS UPDATE_TIME, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN DRIVER_LICENSE ELSE NULL END AS DRIVER_LICENSE, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN DRIVER_NM ELSE NULL END AS DRIVER_NM, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN CASE WHEN GATE_IN_DTM IS NULL OR GATE_IN_DTM = '' THEN SYSDATETIME() ELSE GATE_IN_DTM END ELSE NULL END AS GATE_IN_DTM, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN DRIVER_ID ELSE NULL END AS DRIVER_ID, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN TRUCK_NO ELSE NULL END AS TRUCK_NO, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN GATE_TICKET_NO ELSE NULL END AS GATE_TICKET_NO, PLAN_WH_ID, PLAN_LOC_ID, PLAN_BY, PLAN_DTM, DOC_WGT, #{userId} AS CRT_USER_ID, SYSDATETIME() AS CRT_DTM, VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, CASE WHEN RHDL_MODE = 'C' THEN #{grNo} ELSE GR_NO END AS GR_NO FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND MF_DOC_ID = #{docNo} AND CG_NO = #{cargoNo} AND CHASSIS_NO = #{unitNo} AND IX_CD = #{ixCd}

INSERT /* rehandlingOfRORO.insertRehandlingUnitDamageItem */ INTO TMT_DAMAGE_CHECK ( VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, VSL_CALL_ID, CG_NO, CHAS_NO, SEQ, IX_CD, CATG_CD, DMG_CHK, CHK_LOC, DMG_PART, DMG_LEVEL, INV_CD, INV_CNT, CODE_NUM, CHK_DT, BRAND_CD, MODEL_CD, RMK, CRT_DT, CRT_BY, UPDATE_TIME,
RHDL_MODE, RHDL_NO ) SELECT VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, CASE WHEN #{rhdlModeCd} = 'C' THEN #{nextVslCallId} ELSE VSL_CALL_ID END AS VSL_CALL_ID, CASE WHEN #{rhdlModeCd} = 'C' THEN #{shipgNoteNo} ELSE CG_NO END AS CG_NO, CHAS_NO, SEQ, IX_CD, CATG_CD, DMG_CHK, CHK_LOC, DMG_PART, DMG_LEVEL, INV_CD, INV_CNT, CODE_NUM, CHK_DT, BRAND_CD, MODEL_CD, RMK, SYSDATETIME() AS CRT_DT, CASE WHEN (#{userId} IS NULL OR #{userId} = '') THEN #{loginId} ELSE #{userId} END AS CRT_BY, SYSDATETIME() AS UPDATE_TIME, CASE WHEN (#{userId} IS NULL OR #{userId} = '') THEN #{loginId} ELSE #{userId} END AS UPD_BY, newid() AS ROWID, #{rhdlModeCd}, #{rhdlNo} FROM TMT_DAMAGE_CHECK WHERE CHAS_NO = #{unitNo} AND CG_NO = #{cargoNo} AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}

SELECT 'R' + FORMAT(SYSDATETIME(), 'yyMM') + ISNULL(RTRIM(LTRIM(FORMAT(MAX(CONVERT(INT, RIGHT(GR_NO, 4))) + 1, '0000'))), '0001') FROM TMT_GR WHERE SUBSTRING(GR_NO, 1, 5) = CONCAT('R', FORMAT(SYSDATETIME(), 'yyMM'))
INSERT /* rehandlingOfRORO.insertRehandlingGoodsReceiptItem */ INTO TMT_GR ( GR_NO, TSPT_TP_CD, LORRY_NO, CG_WGT, CG_VOL, PKG_QTY, PKG_TP_CD, CMDT_CD, GDS_DESCR, RMK,
VSL_CALL_ID, SHIPG_NOTE_NO, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION,
UNIT_NO, RHDL_NO, RHDL_MODE ) SELECT #{grNo} AS GR_NO, TSPT_TP_CD, LORRY_NO, CG_WGT, CG_VOL, PKG_QTY, PKG_TP_CD, CMDT_CD, GDS_DESCR, RMK,
#{vslCallId} AS VSL_CALL_ID, #{cargoNo} AS SHIPG_NOTE_NO, SYSDATETIME() AS UPDATE_TIME, #{userId} AS STAFF_CD, NULL AS VERSION,
UNIT_NO, #{rhdlNo} AS RHDL_NO, #{rhdlModeCd} AS RHDL_MODE FROM TMT_GR WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{cargoNo} AND UNIT_NO = #{unitNo}
mapper.update:
BEGIN UPDATE /* rehandlingOfRORO.updateAmount4ShippingNoteItem */ TMT_SHIPG_NOTE SET CG_WGT = #{rhdlMt}, CG_VOL = #{rhdlM3}, PKG_QTY = #{rhdlQty}, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATETIME(), STAFF_CD = #{userId} WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{nextVslCallId} AND SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo}
UPDATE /* rehandlingOfRORO.updateAmount4ShippingNoteItem */ TMT_SHIPG_NOTE_AMT SET CG_WGT = #{rhdlMt}, CG_VOL = #{rhdlM3}, PKG_QTY = #{rhdlQty}, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATETIME(), STAFF_CD = #{userId} WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{nextVslCallId} AND SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} END

UPDATE /* rehandlingOfRORO.updateAmount4RehandlingItem */ TMT_RHDL_CG SET CG_WGT = #{rhdlMt}, CG_VOL = #{rhdlM3}, PKG_QTY = #{rhdlQty}, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATETIME(), STAFF_CD = #{userId} WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND RHDL_NO = #{rhdlNo}
mapper.delete:
BEGIN DELETE /* rehandlingOfRORO.deleteRehandlingItem */ TMT_RHDL_CG_DTL WHERE RHDL_NO = #{rhdlNo}
DELETE /* rehandlingOfRORO.deleteRehandlingItem */ TMT_RHDL_CG WHERE RHDL_NO = #{rhdlNo} END
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT /* rehandlingOfRORO.selectBlComboBoxItems */ VSL_CD, VSL_CALL_ID, CALL_SEQ, CALL_YEAR FROM TMT_VSL_SCH WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{nextVslCallId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'J' + FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyMMdd') + RIGHT( '000000000' + ISNULL( CONCAT(MAX(CAST(RIGHT(JOB_NO, 9) AS INT)) + 1, ''), '000000000' ), 9 ) AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB
INSERT INTO TMT_JOB( VSL_CD, CALL_SEQ, CALL_YEAR, MF_DOC_ID, JOB_NO, JOB_TP_CD, JOB_CO_CD, WORK_ST_DT, WORK_END_DT, PKG_QTY, CG_VOL, CG_WGT, STAT_CD, CG_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, JOB_PURP_CD, JOB_GROUP, DMG_YN, RHDL_MODE, RHDL_NO, SHU_YN, OPE_CLASS_CD, DELV_TP_CD, PKG_TP_CD, TSPT_TP_CD, LORRY_NO, GATE_TXN_NO, FNL_OPE_YN, TO_LOC_ID, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION, CHAS_NO ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callSeq}, #{callYear}, #{mfDocId}, #{jobNo}, #{jobTpCd}, #{jobCoCd}, SYSDATETIME(), SYSDATETIME(), ISNULL(#{pkgQty},0), ISNULL(#{msrmt},0), ISNULL(#{wgt},0), #{statCd}, #{cgNo}, #{vslCallId}, #{jobPurpCd}, (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CONVERT(NUMERIC(10, 0), S.JOB_GROUP)), 0) + 1 AS JOBGROUP FROM TMT_JOB S WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} ), CASE WHEN #{dmgYn} IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='N' THEN 'N' END, #{rhdlMode}, #{rhdlNo}, CASE WHEN #{shuYn} IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{shuYn} ='false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{shuYn} ='Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{shuYn} ='N' THEN 'N' END, #{opeClassCd}, #{delvTpCd}, #{pkgTpCd}, #{tsptTpCd}, #{lorryId}, #{gateTxnNo}, #{fnlOpeYn}, #{toLocId}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{newVersion}, #{unitNos} )

INSERT INTO TMT_JOB_DTL ( VSL_CD, CALL_SEQ, CALL_YEAR, VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, JOB_NO, JOB_TP_CD, SEQ, PKG_QTY, CG_VOL, CG_WGT, SHIPG_NOTE_NO, GR_NO, DMG_YN, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, RMK, RORO_SEQ, LORRY_NO, DRIVER_ID, STEVEDORE_ID, GATE_TXN_NO, CHAS_NO, RHDL_NO ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callSeq}, #{callYear}, #{nextVslCallId}, #{docNo}, #{grNo}, #{jobNo}, #{jobTpCd}, #{seq}, TRY_CONVERT(NUMERIC(15, 0), ISNULL(#{pkgQty}, 0)), TRY_CONVERT(NUMERIC(15, 3), ISNULL(#{unitM3}, 0)), TRY_CONVERT(NUMERIC(15, 3), ISNULL(#{unitMt}, 0)), #{cargoNo}, #{grNo}, CASE WHEN #{dmgYn} IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='N' THEN 'N' END, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{rmk}, #{roroSeq}, #{lorryNo}, #{driverId}, #{stevedoreId}, #{gateTxnNo}, #{unitNo}, #{rhdlNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* rehandlingOfRORO.updateAmount4JobItem */ TMT_JOB SET CG_WGT = #{rhdlMt}, CG_VOL = #{rhdlM3}, PKG_QTY = #{rhdlQty}, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATETIME(), STAFF_CD = #{userId} WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{nextVslCallId} AND JOB_NO = #{jobNo}
